comment:
*  class CharsetRecog_2022  part of the ICU charset detection implementation.
 *                           This is a superclass for the individual detectors for
 *                           each of the detectable members of the ISO 2022 family
 *                           of encodings.
 *
 *                           The separate classes are nested within this class.

methods.name: int match(byte[] text, int textLen, byte[][] escapeSequences)
methods.comment:
* Matching function shared among the 2022 detectors JP, CN and KR
     * Counts up the number of legal an unrecognized escape sequences in
     * the sample of text, and computes a score based on the total number &
     * the proportion that fit the encoding.
     *
     *
     * @param text the byte buffer containing text to analyse
     * @param textLen  the size of the text in the byte.
     * @param escapeSequences the byte escape sequences to test for.
     * @return match quality, in the range of 0-100.

methodNames: int match(byte[] text, int textLen, byte[][] escapeSequences)
